ProjectTitle: Piracy and its control: assessing harms and appraising counterpiracy efforts across regional contexts
InitialFeedbackHistory:
10/05/2023
Hi Letizia,

I just called you. We have still not receive the correct Data Management Plan for your FWO project, using the FWO template. FWO are reminding us that this is still outstanding. 

For research projects funded by FWO, the data management plan needs to be written using the FWO template. This contains additional topics / questions to those addressed in your current plan. You can use your current content; then add the additional information FWO requires. 

You can write this using the DMPonline tool, or a Word template. Info and template are available here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp

Thanks, Veerle Van den Eynden
